TopicTitle: New rapier that runs on anything

Articles.Content: Just make it be a normal rapier except with less thrust and have a fifth nozzle in the centre that can be turned on or off and be used to just shoot out anything left over like plain liquid fuel, (shooting it out like a water house so little efficiency) monopropelant, Xeon gas, oxidizer (left over), or intake air (when not enough for a jet). I cannot code but can model so I Can help. And the middle nozzle could be turned on and off and you could choose which fuel it uses.
Interesting idea. I would support this, but I don't think there is quite enough need for something like this in order for it to be put in the game.
But if you run out of fuel just switch to mono or left over oxidizer (from using it in jet mode)

I think to keep it balanced against the other engines its "firehose" mode would need to be miserably inefficient. which might disappoint you all-in-all.

One of the counterweights to having multiple engines for multiple purposes is their combined weight jumps. A multi-tool like the engine you suggest would need to offset its static scaling-weight with really awful performance, I would think.
try Interstellar. stock multiengine module only supports 2 engine modes.
